body:
ever since I joined avic I was blown away by the unique maps and variety of players I met , and I knew at that moment I wanted to give back to the community. for about 6 months I have been working on maps that I hope you guys (and gals) would like so if you would like to see the test versions of these maps just tell me so I may invite you to my realm were I have them there.i would love feedback on themas I have worked very hard on them

~sincerely

Aaron

title: my  wip map(s)
